attributes.title: Sales Manager
attributes.description:
## Sales Manager. What is needed?
The work as a Sales Manager is quite active. First of all, you need to have English or German proficiency and be attentive and sociable.
Our ideal sales manager is affable, friendly, not afraid to encounter difficulties and work on mistakes, knows how to convince people, and strikes the happy medium in communication.
You also need high-speed Internet access, and you must always be in touch.
## What are the responsibilities of the Sales Manager?
* Making calls and communicating with clients
* Organization of interviews for a client
* Communication with the client and employees
* Reporting, completing tables
## About us
Text: RemotEmployees is an outstaffing company that provides jobs, focusing on the European and American markets.
Cooperation with us will allow you to acquire new skills in the fields of IT and marketing and develop communication skills with foreign native speakers. 
We are a friendly and responsive team of young, like-minded people where each of the employees is ready to help you with adaptation.
If you think you are suitable for the vacancy of sales manager, please leave your contact information, and we will contact you!
## What do we offer
* **Remote work** 

Work remotely from anywhere in the world. A laptop and the Internet are all you need..
* **Career growth** 

As soon as you feel that you are ready for a new, more complex job, we will help you get it.
* **Foreign projects** 

Work for an outstaffing company on foreign projects. No IT experience is required.
* **Language practice** 

Improve your English by communicating and collaborating with companies from the USA, Canada, Germany, France, and others.
attributes.subTitle: We need an employee with knowledge of English or German at B1 level and above
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees outstaffing company offers to take up the position of online sales manager. Knowledge of English at B1 level and above. Remote work. No experience is needed.
